ClsC_40c8a6de.class_description: Narrative forms in which urban legends are expressed and shared, including specific urban legend stories and closely related tales whose factâ€“fiction boundary is blurred.
ClsC_40c8a6de.evidence_excerpt: Narrative stories, such as urban legends and similar tales, whose line between fact and fiction is often blurred.

members.entity_description: A modern folklore story, such as the Hook Man, widely shared in communities.
members.resolution_context: While the specifics of the story may vary, the underlying fear of the unknown and the threat of danger remain constant in urban legends like the "Hook Man."

members.entity_description: Narrative stories, such as urban legends and similar tales, whose line between fact and fiction is often blurred for listeners.
members.resolution_context: Both mentions occur in the same sentence and refer to the same kind of narrative stories (urban legends and similar tales), differing only in phrasing.

members.entity_description: Narratives, including urban legends, that can be quickly shared via internet and social media.
members.resolution_context: In the age of the internet and social media, stories can be shared and disseminated at lightning speed, reaching a global audience in a matter of seconds.

ClsC_800994c6.class_description: Social groups, cultural environments, and global scopes that form the audience and context in which urban legends circulate and gain influence.
ClsC_800994c6.evidence_excerpt: Groups and mainstream culture where urban legends circulate and spread around the world to a global audience.

members.entity_description: Groups of people, both large and small, that share and retell urban legends as a means of social cohesion and mutual protection.
members.resolution_context: Both entities share the same name, type, and context of urban-legend sharing groups, differing only in emphasis, so they clearly refer to the same concept.

members.entity_description: Mainstream cultural environment where widely shared stories, media, and urban legends circulate and exert influence.
members.resolution_context: Both mentions refer to the same general idea of mainstream culture as the sphere where urban legends circulate and have impact, differing only slightly in type_hint wording.

members.entity_description: Societies linked through trade and travel, enabling wider spread of legends.
members.resolution_context: As societies became more interconnected through trade and travel, urban legends began to spread across regions and continents, taking on new forms and variations.

members.entity_description: Worldwide population that can receive urban legend stories almost instantaneously online.
members.resolution_context: In the age of the internet and social media, stories can be shared and disseminated at lightning speed, reaching a global audience in a matter of seconds.

members.entity_description: Global scope over which the Hook Man legend is told.
members.resolution_context: One of the most famous urban legends is that of the "Hook Man," a story that has been told in various forms around the world.

ClsC_0b969894.class_description: Narrative constructs (stories and legend variants) used to explain phenomena, convey caution, and evolve through collective creativity.
ClsC_0b969894.evidence_excerpt: Stories and new forms of legends, often products of collective imagination, used to explain the unknown.

members.entity_name: new forms and variations of legends
members.entity_description: Altered versions of urban legends emerging as they spread geographically.
members.resolution_context: As societies became more interconnected through trade and travel, urban legends began to spread across regions and continents, taking on new forms and variations.

members.entity_description: Shared inventive capacity of groups that generates many urban legends.
members.resolution_context: While some stories may be based on real events or historical figures, many urban legends are the product of collective imagination and creativity.

members.entity_name: stories used to explain the unknown
members.entity_description: Narratives created to make sense of unexplained or poorly understood phenomena.
members.resolution_context: The origins of urban legends can be traced back to ancient times when stories were used to explain the unknown and the supernatural.

members.entity_description: Narratives passed down through generations and shared in communities worldwide.
members.resolution_context: These stories, passed down through generations and shared in communities around the world, serve as cautionary tales that reflect the fears and anxieties of society.

ClsC_2a9c0bef.class_description: Groups of people, from broad cultures to close loved ones, that shape or are protected by the sharing of legends and stories.
ClsC_2a9c0bef.evidence_excerpt: Different cultures and loved ones whose interests, fears, and protection are tied to shared tales.

members.entity_description: Different cultural groups whose interests and fears shape story variations.
members.resolution_context: These tales were often shared orally, passed down from one generation to the next, and evolved over time to suit the interests and fears of different cultures.

members.entity_description: Family members or close associates whom communities aim to protect by sharing legends.
members.resolution_context: By sharing these tales, communities can come together to protect themselves and their loved ones from perceived threats, real or imagined.

ClsC_b3398f6d.class_description: Constituent elements in cautionary urban legend narratives, including vulnerable targets and the lures or objects used to entice them.
ClsC_b3398f6d.evidence_excerpt: Stories of strangers luring children with candy ... warn listeners about the dangers that lurk

members.entity_description: Sweet treats used as bait by strangers in cautionary urban legend narratives.
members.resolution_context: Stories of strangers luring children with candy, haunted houses with dark pasts, and cursed objects warn listeners about the dangers that lurk in the world around them.

members.entity_description: Young individuals portrayed as vulnerable targets in the candy-luring urban legend.
members.resolution_context: Stories of strangers luring children with candy, haunted houses with dark pasts, and cursed objects warn listeners about the dangers that lurk in the world around them.
